definitions: The action of adopting a position where one's knees are bent and one's buttocks are close to or touching one's heels or the ground.
The action of occupying an unused or abandoned building or land, typically without legal permission.
The action of a person or animal resting with their body close to the ground.
examples: She was squatting by the campfire, warming her hands.
The group was squatting in the old factory.
The cat was squatting in the bushes, watching a bird.
